description.narrative: For the first year NEMA took responsibility for planning and organising the updating of the National Preparedness Planning, which was supported technically and financially by UNICEF and OCHA. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/01/2018

title.narrative: # of States with regularly updated & funded contingency plans

actual.value: 2016:26 states successfully updated their contingency plans. Some of the states are now attracting various levels of improved funding from their state governments.
